channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Tech Giant Nvidia Chooses Taiwan for Its First R&D Center in Asia
item.description: American tech powerhouse Nvidia will build its first Asia-based R&D center in Taiwan. Sources in Taiwan say government recruitment of foreign investment played a key role in the de

item.title: First Phase of Asia’s Biggest Offshore Wind Farm Completed
item.description: Asia’s biggest offshore wind farm has completed its first phase of construction. President Tsai Ing-wen was at Taichung Port for a ceremony to mark the occasion.

item.title: Conservationists Urge Greater Protection for Endangered Leopard Cats
item.description: Conservation groups are calling for better protection for Taiwan’s endangered leopard cats, the country's only extant indigenous wild feline species.

item.title: U.S. Space Force Says China’s Satellites Could Be Used Against Taiwan
item.description: Officers from the U.S. Space Force say China's growing satellite network could be used in an attack on Taiwan.
